option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# CARA CEK LOGCAT & SHARE KE SAYA
## LANGKAH 1: Buka Logcat di Android Studio
1. **Klik tab Logcat** di bawah (Alt+6) 2. **Filter** untuk hasil yang jelas
---
## FILTER YANG HARUS DICOBA
### Filter 1: ScheduleViewModel & Repository ``` Tag: Schedule ``` **Atau ketik di search:** ``` package:mine tag:ScheduleViewModel | tag:ScheduleRepository ```
### Filter 2: OkHttp (Untuk lihat network) ``` Tag: OkHttp ```
### Filter 3: Semua Error ``` level:error ```
### Filter 4: Package Anda Saja ``` package:mine ```
---
## LANGKAH 2: Ambil Log
### Cara 1: Copy dari Logcat 1. Klik kanan di Logcat 2. Pilih **"Copy"** atau **"Select All"** (Ctrl+A) 3. Copy (Ctrl+C) 4. Paste di sini
### Cara 2: Export ke File 1. Klik kanan di Logcat 2. Pilih **"Export"** 3. Save as file 4. Share file-nya
### Cara 3: Screenshot 1. Screenshot window Logcat 2. Pastikan terlihat jelas 3. Share screenshot
---
## LOG YANG SAYA BUTUHKAN
Jalankan sekuen ini dan ambil log-nya:
### Sequence Test: ``` 1. Clear Logcat (klik ikon ️) 2. Filter: "Schedule" 3. Klik Add → Add Schedule 4. Isi form jadwal 5. Klik Save 6. Tunggu 5 detik 7. Copy SEMUA log yang muncul 8. Paste di sini ```
---
## ✅ LOG YANG BERHASIL (Contoh)
Kalau berhasil, Anda akan lihat seperti ini:
``` 2025-11-26 10:30:00.123 12345-12345 ScheduleViewModel D Menyimpan jadwal baru: Test 2025-11-26 10:30:00.125 12345-12345 ScheduleViewModel D Request: ScheduleRequest(...) 2025-11-26 10:30:00.150 12345-12345 ScheduleRepository D POST /api/schedules 2025-11-26 10:30:00.152 12345-12345 ScheduleRepository D Request Body: ScheduleRequest(...) 2025-11-26 10:30:00.456 12345-12345 ScheduleRepository D Response Code: 201 2025-11-26 10:30:00.458 12345-12345 ScheduleRepository D ✅ Jadwal tersimpan di server 2025-11-26 10:30:00.460 12345-12345 ScheduleRepository D Refreshing local data... 2025-11-26 10:30:00.462 12345-12345 ScheduleRepository D GET /api/schedules... 2025-11-26 10:30:00.678 12345-12345 ScheduleRepository D Response Code: 200 2025-11-26 10:30:00.680 12345-12345 ScheduleRepository D Data diterima: 1 jadwal 2025-11-26 10:30:00.682 12345-12345 ScheduleRepository D Disimpan ke Room: 1 jadwal 2025-11-26 10:30:00.685 12345-12345 ScheduleViewModel D ✅ Jadwal berhasil disimpan! ```
---
## ❌ LOG ERROR (Contoh)
Kalau ada error, akan ada emoji ❌:
``` 2025-11-26 10:30:00.123 12345-12345 ScheduleViewModel D Menyimpan jadwal baru: Test 2025-11-26 10:30:00.125 12345-12345 ScheduleViewModel D Request: ScheduleRequest(...) 2025-11-26 10:30:00.150 12345-12345 ScheduleRepository D POST /api/schedules 2025-11-26 10:30:00.456 12345-12345 ScheduleRepository E ❌ API Error 401: {"message":"Unauthenticated"} 2025-11-26 10:30:00.458 12345-12345 ScheduleViewModel E ❌ Gagal menyimpan jadwal: API Error: 401 ```
---
## ALTERNATIF: CEK OKHTTP LOG
Kalau log Schedule tidak muncul, coba filter OkHttp:
``` Filter: OkHttp ```
Anda akan lihat detail request/response:
``` --> POST http://10.0.2.2:8000/api/schedules Content-Type: application/json Accept: application/json Authorization: Bearer 1|xxx
{"nama_matakuliah":"Test","sks":3,"hari":"Monday",...} --> END POST
<-- 201 Created http://10.0.2.2:8000/api/schedules (234ms) content-type: application/json
{"id":"xxx","nama_matakuliah":"Test",...} <-- END HTTP ```
---
## CARA SHARE LOG KE SAYA
### Option 1: Paste Langsung ``` Copy log → Paste di chat ```
### Option 2: Text File ``` 1. Copy log 2. Save as .txt file 3. Share file ```
### Option 3: Screenshot ``` Screenshot Logcat window (Pastikan readable) ```
---
## INFO TAMBAHAN YANG HELPFUL
Sertakan juga:
1. **Device:** Emulator atau HP Fisik? 2. **BASE_URL:** Yang digunakan di ApiClient.kt 3. **Server Laravel:** Jalan atau tidak? 4. **Sudah Login?** Ya atau belum? 5. **Data Form:** Apa yang diinput saat test?
---
## ⚡ QUICK GUIDE
**Copy command ini dan paste di Logcat filter:**
### Untuk Schedule Log: ``` tag:ScheduleViewModel | tag:ScheduleRepository ```
### Untuk Network Log: ``` tag:OkHttp ```
### Untuk Error: ``` level:error package:mine ```
---
**Saya tunggu log-nya!**
Kalau Anda sudah punya screenshot atau text log, share sekarang dan saya akan analisis masalahnya.

option.name: updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
# DEBUG GUIDE - JADWAL TIDAK MUNCUL
## ❌ MASALAH Setelah menambahkan jadwal: - Folder jadwal tidak muncul di Note Folders - List jadwal tidak muncul di Schedule List
---
## ✅ YANG SUDAH SAYA LAKUKAN
### 1. Menambahkan Logging Lengkap File yang sudah diupdate: - ✅ `ScheduleViewModel.kt` - Logging save & refresh - ✅ `ScheduleRepository.kt` - Logging API request/response
### 2. Emoji Logging untuk Mudah Dibaca - = Refreshing data - = GET request - = POST request - = Response received - = Data summary - = Saving to database - ✅ = Success - ❌ = Error
---
## CARA DEBUG (STEP-BY-STEP)
### LANGKAH 1: Buka Logcat 1. Di Android Studio, buka tab **Logcat** (Alt+6) 2. Filter: ketik `Schedule` (untuk filter ScheduleViewModel & ScheduleRepository) 3. Clear log (klik ikon ️)
### LANGKAH 2: Test Tambah Jadwal 1. Run aplikasi 2. Login 3. Klik Add → Add Schedule 4. Isi form jadwal: - Course: "Test Matkul" - SKS: "3" - Day: "Monday" - Start Time: "0800" - (End Time akan otomatis: "10:30") 5. Klik **Save**
### LANGKAH 3: Lihat Log Setelah klik Save, di Logcat Anda akan melihat:
#### ✅ JIKA BERHASIL: ``` ScheduleViewModel: Menyimpan jadwal baru: Test Matkul ScheduleViewModel: Request: ScheduleRequest(...) ScheduleRepository: POST /api/schedules ScheduleRepository: Request Body: ScheduleRequest(...) ScheduleRepository: Response Code: 201 ScheduleRepository: ✅ Jadwal tersimpan di server: ScheduleApiModel(...) ScheduleRepository: Refreshing local data... ScheduleRepository: GET /api/schedules... ScheduleRepository: Response Code: 200 ScheduleRepository: Data diterima: 1 jadwal ScheduleRepository: Disimpan ke Room: 1 jadwal ScheduleViewModel: ✅ Jadwal berhasil disimpan! ```
#### ❌ JIKA GAGAL (Contoh Error):
**Error 1: Tidak Ada Token (401)** ``` ScheduleRepository: ❌ API Error 401: {"message":"Unauthenticated"} ``` **Solusi:** Login dulu untuk dapat token!
**Error 2: Validation Error (422)** ``` ScheduleRepository: ❌ Save Error 422: {"errors":{"nama_matakuliah":["required"]}} ``` **Solusi:** Field tidak lengkap atau format salah
**Error 3: Connection Refused** ``` ScheduleRepository: ❌ Network Failure: Connection refused ``` **Solusi:** Server Laravel tidak jalan atau BASE_URL salah
**Error 4: 404 Not Found** ``` ScheduleRepository: ❌ API Error 404: Route not found ``` **Solusi:** Endpoint `/api/schedules` tidak ada di Laravel
---
## DIAGNOSA MASALAH
### Skenario A: Log Muncul tapi Data Tidak Muncul
**Cek di Log:** ``` ScheduleRepository: Data diterima: 0 jadwal ← MASALAH! ```
**Artinya:** API berhasil, tapi server mengembalikan array kosong.
**Penyebab:** 1. Data tidak tersimpan di database Laravel 2. Query Laravel salah (filter user_id?) 3. Migration Laravel belum di-run
**Solusi:** - Cek database Laravel apakah ada data di tabel `schedules` - Cek Controller Laravel apakah return data dengan benar - Test API dari Postman dulu
---
### Skenario B: Error 401 Unauthorized
**Cek di Log:** ``` ScheduleRepository: ❌ API Error 401: {"message":"Unauthenticated"} ```
**Artinya:** Token tidak ada atau invalid.
**Penyebab:** 1. Belum login atau token hilang 2. Token expired 3. Header Authorization tidak terkirim
**Solusi:** 1. Logout → Login ulang 2. Cek di Logcat OkHttp, apakah ada header: ``` Authorization: Bearer 1|xxxxx ``` 3. Cek `ApiClient.authToken` tidak null
**Test:** ```kotlin // Tambahkan di LoginScreen setelah login sukses: Log.d("Login", "Token: ${ApiClient.authToken}") ```
---
### Skenario C: Connection Refused / Network Error
**Cek di Log:** ``` ScheduleRepository: ❌ Network Failure: Connection refused ```
**Artinya:** Tidak bisa connect ke server.
**Penyebab:** 1. Server Laravel tidak jalan 2. BASE_URL salah (IP atau port) 3. Firewall memblokir 4. WiFi berbeda (jika pakai HP fisik)
**Solusi:** 1. Cek terminal Laravel ada tulisan: `Starting Laravel development server` 2. Test dari browser: `http://10.0.2.2:8000/api/schedules` 3. Cek BASE_URL di ApiClient.kt
---
### Skenario D: Error 422 Validation
**Cek di Log:** ``` ScheduleRepository: ❌ Save Error 422: {"errors":{"jam_mulai":["format invalid"]}} ```
**Artinya:** Data yang dikirim tidak sesuai validasi Laravel.
**Penyebab:** 1. Format waktu salah (Laravel expect `HH:MM:SS`) 2. Field required tidak terisi 3. Tipe data salah (string vs int)
**Solusi:** Cek log Request Body: ``` ScheduleRepository: Request Body: ScheduleRequest( namaMatakuliah=Test, jamMulai=08:00:00, ← Format harus HH:MM:SS jamSelesai=10:30:00 ) ```
Pastikan format sesuai dengan validasi Laravel.
---
### Skenario E: Data Muncul di Log tapi UI Tidak Update
**Cek di Log:** ``` ScheduleRepository: Disimpan ke Room: 1 jadwal ← Berhasil! ```
Tapi UI masih kosong.
**Penyebab:** 1. Flow tidak di-collect di UI 2. ViewModel instance berbeda 3. StateFlow tidak trigger recomposition
**Solusi:** 1. Cek `NoteFolderListScreen` dan `ScheduleListScreen`: ```kotlin val scheduleList by viewModel.mataKuliahList.collectAsState() ``` 2. Pastikan menggunakan `viewModel()` yang sama 3. Try pull to refresh atau restart app
**Test Manual:** Tambahkan log di UI: ```kotlin // Di NoteFolderListScreen LaunchedEffect(mataKuliahList) { Log.d("NoteFolderList", " Schedule count: ${mataKuliahList.size}") } ```
---
## TEST CHECKLIST
Centang satu per satu:
### Server Laravel: - [ ] Server Laravel jalan (`php artisan serve`) - [ ] Database sudah di-migrate - [ ] Table `schedules` ada di database - [ ] Route `/api/schedules` ada di `routes/api.php` - [ ] Controller return data dengan benar - [ ] Middleware auth sudah benar
### Android App: - [ ] Sudah login (token ada) - [ ] BASE_URL benar di ApiClient.kt - [ ] Permission INTERNET ada - [ ] Logcat bisa dilihat - [ ] No error di Build
### Network: - [ ] Koneksi internet OK - [ ] Bisa akses server dari browser - [ ] Firewall tidak memblokir - [ ] WiFi sama (jika HP fisik)
---
## QUICK FIX CHECKLIST
Coba satu per satu sampai berhasil:
### Fix 1: Restart Everything ``` 1. Stop app 2. Stop Laravel server 3. Start Laravel server 4. Rebuild app (Build → Rebuild Project) 5. Run app 6. Login ulang 7. Test tambah jadwal ```
### Fix 2: Clear Database Room ```kotlin // Di ScheduleViewModel, tambahkan: fun clearLocalDatabase() { viewModelScope.launch { scheduleDao.deleteAll() // Buat method ini di DAO refreshDataFromNetwork() } } ```
### Fix 3: Force Refresh ```kotlin // Di NoteFolderListScreen, tambahkan: LaunchedEffect(Unit) { scheduleViewModel.refreshDataFromNetwork() } ```
### Fix 4: Test API Manual ```bash # Test dari Postman atau curl curl -X GET http://10.0.2.2:8000/api/schedules \ -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \ -H "Accept: application/json" ```
---
## SCREENSHOT YANG PERLU ANDA KIRIM
Jika masih error, screenshot:
1. **Logcat** (filter: `Schedule`) - Saat klik Save - Full error stack trace
2. **OkHttp Log** (filter: `OkHttp`) - Request headers - Request body - Response code - Response body
3. **Database Laravel** - SELECT * FROM schedules; - Screenshot hasil query
4. **ApiClient.kt** - Baris BASE_URL yang digunakan
5. **Terminal Laravel** - Server logs saat request masuk
---
## CARA MEMBACA LOG
### Log Normal (Berhasil): ``` → → 201 → ✅ → → → 200 → 1 → → ✅ ```
### Log Error (Gagal): ``` → → 422 → ❌ (Validation error) → → 401 → ❌ (Unauthorized) → → ❌ (Connection error) ```
---
## NEXT STEPS
**SEKARANG:** 1. Run aplikasi 2. Buka Logcat (filter: `Schedule`) 3. Test tambah jadwal 4. Screenshot log 5. Kirim ke saya jika masih error
**KALAU BERHASIL:** - ✅ Data muncul di Logcat - ✅ Jadwal muncul di UI - ✅ Masalah solved!
**KALAU MASIH ERROR:** - Screenshot Logcat + detail error - Baca diagnosa sesuai skenario error - Follow solusi yang diberikan
---
**Dibuat:** 26 November 2025 **Tujuan:** Debug masalah jadwal tidak muncul **Status:** ✅ Logging sudah ditambahkan, siap debug!

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# ⚡ QUICK FIX - Array vs Object Error
## ERROR YANG ANDA ALAMI
``` Expected BEGIN_ARRAY but was BEGIN_OBJECT ```
---
## CEK RESPONSE SERVER
Test endpoint ini di browser/Postman: ``` GET http://localhost:8000/api/schedules ```
### ❌ Kalau hasilnya seperti ini (SALAH): ```json { "status": "success", "data": [ ... ], "message": "..." } ```
### ✅ Harus seperti ini (BENAR): ```json [ { "id": "1", "nama_matakuliah": "Test", ... } ] ```
---
## ✅ FIX CEPAT (3 MENIT)
### 1. Buka Laravel Controller ``` app/Http/Controllers/ScheduleController.php ```
### 2. Ubah Method index()
**Ganti:** ```php return response()->json([ 'data' => $schedules ]); ```
**Dengan:** ```php return response()->json($schedules); ```
### 3. Restart Server ```bash php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 ```
### 4. Test Lagi
Run Android app → Tambah jadwal → Harus sukses! ✅
---
## FULL CODE YANG BENAR
```php <?php
namespace App\Http\Controllers;
use App\Models\Schedule; use Illuminate\Http\Request;
class ScheduleController extends Controller { public function index(Request $request) { $schedules = Schedule::where('user_id', $request->user()->id) ->orderBy('hari') ->orderBy('jam_mulai') ->get();
// ✅ LANGSUNG RETURN ARRAY return response()->json($schedules); }
public function store(Request $request) { $validated = $request->validate([ 'nama_matakuliah' => 'required|string', 'sks' => 'required|integer', 'dosen' => 'nullable|string', 'hari' => 'required|string', 'jam_mulai' => 'required|date_format:H:i:s', 'jam_selesai' => 'required|date_format:H:i:s', 'ruangan' => 'nullable|string' ]);
$schedule = Schedule::create([ 'user_id' => $request->user()->id, ...$validated ]);
// ✅ RETURN SINGLE OBJECT (ini OK) return response()->json($schedule, 201); } } ```
---
## ✅ CHECKLIST
- [ ] Cek response di browser (harus array) - [ ] Edit ScheduleController.php - [ ] Restart Laravel server - [ ] Test dari browser lagi - [ ] Run Android app - [ ] Test tambah jadwal - [ ] Cek Logcat (harus ✅) - [ ] Jadwal muncul di UI
---
## EXPECTED LOGCAT (Setelah Fix)
``` POST /api/schedules Response Code: 201 ✅ Jadwal tersimpan di server Refreshing local data... GET /api/schedules... Response Code: 200 Data diterima: 1 jadwal ← Ini harus muncul! Disimpan ke Room: 1 jadwal ✅ Jadwal berhasil disimpan! ```
---
## MASIH ERROR?
**Screenshot:** 1. Response GET /api/schedules dari browser 2. Code ScheduleController.php method index() 3. Logcat setelah test
---
**Status:** ✅ Masalah clear! **Fix Time:** 3 menit **Difficulty:** ⭐ Mudah

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# ⚡ QUICK FIX - JADWAL TIDAK MUNCUL
## CEK LOGCAT DULU!
``` 1. Buka Logcat (Alt+6) 2. Filter: ketik "Schedule" 3. Clear log 4. Test tambah jadwal 5. Lihat hasilnya ```
---
## ✅ LOG BERHASIL (Harus Muncul Ini):
``` Menyimpan jadwal baru: XXX POST /api/schedules Response Code: 201 ✅ Jadwal tersimpan di server Refreshing local data... GET /api/schedules... Response Code: 200 Data diterima: 1 jadwal Disimpan ke Room: 1 jadwal ✅ Jadwal berhasil disimpan! ```
**Kalau semua ✅ muncul tapi UI masih kosong:** → Restart aplikasi atau force refresh
---
## ❌ ERROR UMUM & SOLUSI CEPAT
### 1. Error 401 Unauthorized ``` ❌ API Error 401: {"message":"Unauthenticated"} ```
**Solusi:** ``` 1. Logout 2. Login ulang 3. Test tambah jadwal lagi ```
---
### 2. Connection Refused ``` ❌ Network Failure: Connection refused ```
**Solusi:** ``` 1. Cek server Laravel jalan: php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0
2. Test dari browser: http://10.0.2.2:8000/api/schedules
3. Cek BASE_URL di ApiClient.kt ```
---
### 3. Error 404 Not Found ``` ❌ API Error 404: Route not found ```
**Solusi:** ``` Cek di Laravel routes/api.php ada: Route::get('/schedules', ...); Route::post('/schedules', ...); ```
---
### 4. Error 422 Validation ``` ❌ Save Error 422: {"errors":{...}} ```
**Solusi:** ``` Lihat detail error di log. Biasanya format data salah.
Cek Request Body di log: Request Body: ScheduleRequest(...)
Pastikan format waktu: "08:00:00" (HH:MM:SS) ```
---
### 5. Data Diterima 0 Jadwal ``` Data diterima: 0 jadwal ← MASALAH! ```
**Solusi:** ``` 1. Cek database Laravel: SELECT * FROM schedules;
2. Data ada tapi tidak muncul? - Cek query di Controller Laravel - Mungkin filter user_id salah
3. Test API dari Postman dulu ```
---
## TEST API DARI POSTMAN
### Test GET Schedules: ``` GET http://localhost:8000/api/schedules Headers: Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN Accept: application/json ```
### Test POST Schedule: ``` POST http://localhost:8000/api/schedules Headers: Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN Accept: application/json Content-Type: application/json
Body (JSON): { "nama_matakuliah": "Test", "sks": 3, "dosen": "Dr. Test", "hari": "Monday", "jam_mulai": "08:00:00", "jam_selesai": "10:30:00", "ruangan": "R101" } ```
**Kalau berhasil di Postman tapi gagal di App:** → Masalah di Android app (token, format data, dll)
**Kalau gagal di Postman:** → Masalah di Laravel (route, controller, validasi)
---
## FORCE RESTART
Kalau bingung, coba ini:
``` 1. Stop aplikasi Android 2. Stop server Laravel 3. Start server Laravel: php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 4. Build → Rebuild Project 5. Run aplikasi 6. Login ulang 7. Test lagi ```
---
## CHECKLIST CEPAT
Cek satu per satu:
**Laravel:** - [ ] Server jalan (`php artisan serve`) - [ ] Database ada & sudah migrate - [ ] Route `/api/schedules` ada - [ ] Bisa akses dari browser
**Android:** - [ ] Sudah login (ada token) - [ ] BASE_URL benar - [ ] No error di Build - [ ] Logcat terbuka
**Network:** - [ ] Bisa ping server - [ ] Firewall dibuka - [ ] WiFi sama (jika HP fisik)
---
## MASIH ERROR?
**Kirim Screenshot:** 1. Logcat (filter: Schedule) 2. OkHttp log (full request/response) 3. Terminal Laravel 4. BASE_URL di ApiClient.kt
**Detail yang perlu:** - Device: Emulator / HP Fisik - Error message lengkap - Sudah coba apa saja
---
## TIPS DEBUG
1. **Selalu lihat Logcat DULU** - Emoji logging memudahkan tracking - ✅ = sukses, ❌ = error
2. **Test API dari Postman dulu** - Pastikan backend OK sebelum debug app
3. **Restart is your friend** - Kalau bingung, restart semuanya
4. **Check Token** - Filter OkHttp, cek header Authorization
5. **Database Laravel** - Cek manual apakah data tersimpan
---
**Last Update:** 26 November 2025 **File Lengkap:** DEBUG_JADWAL_TIDAK_MUNCUL.md
